Headline: Business Analyst/Business Process Consultant/Admin
Bio: With more than a decade of experience in operations and customer service, I had the opportunity to work with startups and Fortune 500 companies to ensure quality while implementing new training, policies, and procedures that lead to scaling out businesses. I am highly experienced in building processes in ambiguous environments. As an operational manager for process improvements, I have been able to support, lead a team, and create new b2b relationships to generate growth in hospitality, health and wellness, insurance, financial services, and construction management.
